channel.title: CVE Feed for ooohboi -- OoohBoi Steroids for Elementor
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ooohboi -- OoohBoi Steroids for Elementor

item.title: CVE-2023-1169|2024-08-02T05:40:58.013Z -- ooohboi -- ooohboi%20steroids%20for%20elementor
item.description: The OoohBoi Steroids for Elementor plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to missing authorization due to a missing capability check on the 'file_uploader_callback' function in versions up to, and including, 2.1.4. This makes it possible for subscriber-level attackers to upload image attachments to the site.
